title: Boltzmann distribution - compare He to H2

content.question: The distribution of speeds of H2(g) molecules at 273 K and 1 atm is shown in the diagram above. Which of the following best shows the speed distribution of He(g) atoms under the same conditions of temperature and pressure?

choices.label: The dashed line starts just to the right of the origin and curves up sharply to a peak above and to the left of the peak of the solid line, then curves down, crosses the solid line to the left of the solid line’s peak, and continues to move gradually toward the horizontal axis at the right side of the graph.

The dashed line starts at the origin and curves gently up, crosses the solid line, then curves up sharply to a peak above and to the right of the peak of the solid line, then curves sharply down to end near the horizontal axis at the right side of the graph.
The dashed line is roughly parallel to and just below the solid line.
The dashed line is roughly the same size and shape as the solid line, but its peak is to the right of the peak of the solid line.

content.answer: The dashed line starts just to the right of the origin and curves up sharply to a peak above and to the left of the peak of the solid line, then curves down, crosses the solid line to the left of the solid line’s peak, and continues to move gradually toward the horizontal axis at the right side of the graph.

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
